headLineText: Get 20% off your next order when you sign up for Panda Express Rewards

smallDescription: Earn a one time $5 Cash Back on your Starbucks purchase of $5 or more, see details!
longDescription:
Limited time single use only!

  1. Look for and click on the Starbucks tile towards the bottom of your “All Deals” page. 
  2. In the offer details, click the Enroll Now link and sign in to your Starbucks Rewards Account to complete your enrollment.
  3. Make an in-app purchase or in-app reload of $5 or more with your linked Bank of America Debit or Credit card. 

Upon successful enrollment, eligible in-app purchases will start earning 2% Cash Back and Bonus Stars. When you make an eligible in-app purchase of at least $5, your $5 Cash Back bonus will show as a single cash back transaction on the “Earned” tab.
